name: tezbridge-network
description: The TezBridge network library for Tezos blockchain in JavaScript with Flow type system

scripts.test: flow && parcel build test/index.js --target node -o test.js && node dist/test.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && rm -rf .cache && flow && parcel build src/index.js --target node && parcel build src/index.js -o browser.js

author: catsigma
